QuestData.Title: Rage and Wisdom
QuestData.Description: An endless war wages between the creatures of the eastern wilds and the beasts of the western wasteland.$b$bShould one side overwhelm the other, all of Draenor would fall at the hand of the victor.$b$bI sent Rangari Erdanii to the heart of the battle between these two forces. It is likely that she will need your help, commander.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Rangari Erdanii at Affliction Ridge.
QuestData.RewardText: These creatures are relentless in their assault against one another.

Objectives.Objective: Ask Rangari Rajess to fly you to Rangari Erdanii
